channel.title: Congress on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Congress on PepsFeeder

item.title: Congress makes lynching a federal crime, 65 years after Till
item.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Sixty-five years after 14-year-extinct Emmett Till was lynched in Mississippi, Congress has authorized regulations designating lynching as a hate crime below federal law.

item.title: China threatens US retaliation for supporting Hong Kong protests
item.description: BEIJING (Reuters) – China’s Foreign Ministry on Tuesday summoned a senior US diplomat and threatened retaliatory measures against Washington after the US Senate adopted a law supporting demonstrators in Hong Kong, which has been under protests since June.
